name: ProfitIndicators.com
tag_list: share-market-software, stocks-technical-analysis, nse, bse, nasdaq, macd, stochastic-oscillator, dmi, bullish-bearish-indicator
overview:
This is a free software / website for EOD analysis. It displays nearly 15 Technical indicators in one page which was easy to compare between indicators. It displays the following charts / indicators with brief introduction on how to use those indicators.

  • Candlestick Charts

  • Bar Charts

  • Volume Charts

  • Moving Averages (MA)

  • MA Envelopes

  • Bollinger Bands

  • Moving Average Convergence 

     Divergence (MACD)

  • Percentage Price Oscillator (PPO)

  • Stochastic Oscillator

  • Price Rate of Change (ROC)

  • Elder Force Index (EFI)

  • On Balance Volume (OBV)

  • Price and Volume Trend (PVT)

  • Money Flow Index (MFI)

  • Commodity Channel Index (CCI)

  • Relative Strength Index (RSI)

  • William’s %R (WMS)

  • Directional Movement Index (DMI)

  • Bullish Bearish Indicator (BBI)

also, the technical summary page sounds to be more useful. It shows the trends of various indicators for a stock based on the current EOD.
